More than a decade after the original's release, Alan Wake 2 finally arrived in 2023--and it didn’t disappoint. Our Alan Wake 2 review gave it a stellar 10/10, thanks to a memorable campaign, unique survival-horror mechanics, and somehow living up to the 13 years of hype. Anyone who missed out on the instant classic will now find Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition for $50 (was $80) during Black Friday, the lowest price we’ve ever seen.

Both the PS5 and Xbox Series X versions are eligible for the savings, making this the ideal time to finally cross Alan Wake 2 off your wishlist. The deluxe edition is a particularly great entry point for newcomers, as it also includes Alan Wake Remastered, giving you a chance to play through the original story before diving into the sequel. Both titles received positive reviews, and if you’re a fan of supernatural thrillers, you’ll find much to love about the two games.

Here's a look at everything included in Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition.

Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition Contents

  • Alan Wake 2 physical game
  • The Night Springs and Lake House expansions
  • Various in-game cosmetics
  • Alan Wake Remastered digital voucher

That’s an impressive lineup of content, and for just $50, it’s an easy recommendation. We haven’t seen many price cuts for Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition, making this a Black Friday sale worth checking out.

Alan Wake 2 follows both its namesake character and FBI agent Saga Anderson as it weaves two unique storylines. Alan is attempting to escape the Dark Place--a supernatural location with unknown origins--while Saga Anderson is investigating a murder. Things eventually spiral out of control, and its conclusion will stick with you long after you put down the controller. It’s a thrilling tale, and one that should please longtime fans of the franchise.

item.title: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Is Discounted To $40 For Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/epic-mickey-rebrushed-is-discounted-to-40-for-black-friday/1100-6527936/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The original Epic Mickey hit consoles in 2010, but if you missed out on the 3D platformer back then, today you’ll find its remake, Epic Mickey: Rebrushed, discounted to just $40 (was $60). Best Buy is slashing its price for Black Friday, and since the deal applies to PS5, Switch, and Xbox Series X, there’s no reason to miss out on the family-friendly adventure.

Epic Mickey: Rebrushed is a faithful update of Disney’s popular platformer. Along with a fresh coat of paint and HD visuals, Mickey has been granted a new arsenal of special abilities--such as dash and ground pound, along with sprinting. Controls have also been reworked to be more comfortable, ditching the clunky motion controls used on Wii.

In other words, much of the original game’s spirit remains intact, though it has received plenty of quality-of-life improvements and shiny new graphics.

If you’re a Disney fan, this game is particularly enticing, as you’ll get to journey through Wasteland-- a dangerous realm filled with long-forgotten Disney characters such as Oswald the Lucky Rabbit. Mickey has managed to get his mitts on a magical paintbrush that can erase or manipulate parts of the world, and it’ll be up to you to save this unique world from a scourge known as the Blot.

Best Buy’s deal for Epic Mickey: Rebrushed won’t last long, so whether you’re shopping for yourself or want to cross items off your holiday shopping list, this is the best time to pick up the reimagined game. item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition Is Just $40 For Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/cyberpunk-2077-ultimate-edition-is-just-40-for-black-friday/1100-6527933/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Cyberpunk 2077 wasn't an immediate hit when it was released in 2020, but it’s only grown more enticing over the years. Along with heaps of patches to improve its performance and smooth out gameplay, it received the impressive Phantom Liberty expansion--starring Idris Elba. If you’ve yet to explore Night City, Black Friday is giving you a chance to pick up Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition for just $40 (was $60).

That’s one of the lowest prices we’ve seen all year for the hit game, and since it includes both the base game and Phantom Liberty expansion, it’s the best way to experience the RPG in 2024. As an added bonus, this version features a few collectible stickers. The deal applies to both PS5 and Xbox Series X.

One small quirk with this version is how the DLC is offered. If you buy the Xbox Series X version, you’ll get three discs that contain both the base game and DLC. If you buy the PS5 version, you’ll get one disc and a redeemable code to download Phantom Liberty. Regardless, you’re getting one of the best open-world games in recent years--and since GTA 6 doesn’t seem to be any closer to launching, Cyberpunk 2077 is a great way to bide your time.

Our Phantom Liberty review gave it a 10/10, due to its thrilling main story, impressive performances from both the new and returning cast, and rebuilding its core RPG elements to make combat more satisfying.

“Phantom Liberty is Cyberpunk 2077 at its best,” wrote critic Michael Higham. “CD Projekt Red has taken the lessons from the original release and focused on the parts that mattered most to deliver a thrilling and impactful experience that doesn't overstay its welcome. And although it fits into the original story, it leaves a lasting impact that rewrote my perception of Cyberpunk's world.”
